timeline.bodyText: Actually we shouldn't hard code the endpoint ".dfs.core.windows.net" here, as Chinese user has a different endpoint. Connector SQLDWH also has this problem, can be treated as another feature.
timeline.author: pyzhou-talend

replies.bodyText: yes. good suggestion. if we have this kind of account would check it.
replies.author: jzhao-talend

timeline.message:
feat(TDI-43719):change the family name

* change the family name and i18n which include DWH
